mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.order_id AS "orderId", b.number AS "orderNumber", a.factory_id AS "factoryId", a.factory_name AS "factoryName", a.province_id AS "provinceId", a.province AS "province", a.city_id AS "cityId", a.city AS "city", a.area_id AS "areaId", a.area AS "area", a.street_id AS "streetId", a.street AS "street", a.detail_address AS "detailAddress", a.address_id AS "addressId", c.province AS "receivingProvince", c.city AS "receivingCity", c.district AS "receivingArea", c.street AS "receivingStreet", c.detailed AS "address", a.total_weight AS "totalWeight", a.freight_weight AS "freightWeight", a.freight AS "freight", a.distribution_mode AS "distributionMode", a.tracking_no AS "trackingNo", a.out_status AS "outStatus", a.delivery_time AS "deliveryTime", a.is_deleted AS "isDeleted", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.update_time AS "updateTime"
